column1: In order to most effectively use this report for project and business development planning purposes, please follow the instructions included in Row 7.

column4: CATEGORIES OF EXPERIENCE: If your resource request requires specific experience, please filter the columns in this section to include only "X," depending on if you prefer a resource with project and/or business development experience, or if it's acceptable that the resource's only experience is within the ODP Community of Practice.
column8: ODP OFFERING: If your resource request requires experience working on a specific ODP service offering, please filter that specific column in this section to include only "X," depending on the offering(s) included in your upcoming ODP project.  Note: Review specific responses in Column N (1.1.2 Please specify) if the offering does not fit the named options in Columns H-M.
column15: PROJECT DRIVER: If your resource request requires experience working on a project with a specific driver, please filter that specific column in this section to include only "X," depending on the driver(s) included in your upcoming ODP project.  Note: Review specific responses in Column U (1.2.1 Please specify...) if the offering does not fit the named options in Columns O-T.
column22: INDUSTRY: If your resource request requires experience working with a specific industry, please filter that specific column in this section to include only "X," depending on the industry of your upcoming ODP project.  Note: Review specific responses in Column AH (1.3.2 Please specify...) if the offering does not fit the named options in Columns V-AF.
